Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute at Kimball/Cullom
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball-Homan buses are rerouted in both directions via Kimball, Montrose, Kedzie, Irving Park & Kimball, due to fire department activity near Kimball/Cullom

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Kimball, Montrose, Kedzie, Irving Park, then resume their normal route on Kimball, due to fire department activity near Kimball/Cullom.

Allow extra travel time.
